data.actual_result: Discord shows the default image placeholder (the one before preview generated) and says "Failed to load the image."
data.expected_result: There should be a clickable link of the video file which launches your default web-browser to view movie file
data.short_description: Movie files show up as empty image placeholders
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload a movie file from your phone - Someone else can upload a file too - Try to click on the placeholder
